subject: United States Supreme Court Bu
body:
United States Supreme Court Building, 1 First St NE,
Washington, DC 20543,
US
ATTN: Fund Beneficiary!
I am. Barr Merrick B. Garland from the Federal Supreme Court USA, I am
writing this email to inform you officially that your fund file has
been approved and we have sent your information to Federal Ministry of
Finance to release your fund immediately. The Office of Supreme Court
Washington DC has taken charge after a long delay by other agencies
like IMF, due to mismanagement. It is important to know that I am the
Attorney General who applied to release of your fund totaling Ten
Million Five Hundred Thousand United State Dollars ($10.500,000.USD)
Yes, I did it because it has become known and shameful to our
government that some of agencies here
could not handle an international transaction, as such. We do
apologize for the mismanagement of the IMF and other agencies and
advise you to quit communication with any of them. Your fund will be
released to you soon: you will not face any disappointment in this
again.
Furthermore, we had the Ambassador of your country here signed stamped
your fund documents in our
office. This is legally because it will ensure that the government of
your country will not stop your fund when you start withdrawing.
Finally, it is interesting to know that the management
of Ministry of Economy and Finance (USA) had issued an irrevocable
approval order with Release Code: GNC/3480/02/22 in your favor for the
inheritance entitlement/award winning payment. Transaction ID:
#8345014. To this effect, International monetary fund (IMF) has
deposited your fund since 17th OCTOBER 2023. Hence, you are to contact
the current Minister of Economy and Finance (USA), at below
information for instructions on how to get  your funds:
Name: (Mrs.Sheila Annette),
Email: (
sheilaannette003@gmail.com
)
Yours Faithfully,
Barrister. Merrick B. Garland
(SAN),GENERAL ATTORNEY OF WASHINGTON DC SUPREME COURT.

subject: Re: United States Supreme Court Bu
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the information you have provided regarding my fund file being approved by the United States Supreme Court. It's good to know that the Office of Supreme Court in Washington DC has taken charge after the delay by other agencies.

I understand that you mentioned the Attorney General applied for the release of my fund totaling Ten Million Five Hundred Thousand United State Dollars. That's a significant amount, and I would like to know more about the process and how I can access these funds.

Could you please provide me with more details on how I should proceed? Specifically, who should I contact at the Ministry of Economy and Finance USA? Also, is there any documentation or paperwork that I need to complete in order to receive my funds?

Thank you once again for your assistance. I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Marilyn
